label: Max entanglement 125<->163 limited
pythonCode:
from core.FormulasRegistry import get_registry
reg = get_registry()

# Values from SSoT
ROOTS = reg.roots_total       # 288
hidden = reg.sterile_sector   # 163
visible = reg.visible_sector  # 125

# Von Neumann entropy ceiling
# Max entanglement between 125 visible and 163 hidden
# Particle identities preserved by entropy bound

import math
S_max = math.log(min(visible, hidden))  # Limited by smaller subsystem
entropy_ceiling = math.log(125)  # ~4.828
note: Maximum entanglement between 125 visible and 163 hidden sectors; particle identities preserved
